title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 3, Gemma, Mistral, Phi-3, etc. locally via a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoints.

title: ollama-cli (sammcj/ollama-cli)
summary: Convenience wrapper that adds chat history, prompt templates, and model stats to the ollama CLI.

title: ollama-copilot (github-copilot-ollama)
summary: VS-Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm (ollama-helm/ollama-helm)
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin-friendly, Spring Boot starters available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API; tokio-based.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET library that wraps Ollama endpoints; includes Blazor sample chat app.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines; on PyPI as haystack-ollama.

title: ollama-camunda (camunda-community-hub/ollama-camunda)
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for generative tasks.

title: ollama-obsidian (ollama-obsidian/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an AI sidebar powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Registry listing 30+ community packages: express middleware, test utils, NestJS modules, etc.

title: ollama-pypi (pypi search)
summary: PyPI shows 40+ projects: FastAPI wrappers, Streamlit UIs, embedding servers, CLI tools.

title: ollama-docker-compose (ggerganov/ollama-docker)
summary: Ready-to-run docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama with Open WebUI, Postgres, Qdrant, etc.

title: ollama-reddit discussion
summary: Community thread collecting favorite tools: Raycast plugin, Alfred workflow, Emacs clients.

title: ollama-hackernews launch recap
summary: Hacker News discussion summarizing new integrations since v0.1.30: function calling, vision models.

title: ollama-youtube walkthrough
summary: Video tutorial covering installation, pulling models, and integrating with LangChain & Obsidian.
